checklistDescription: TODO Items for new members of product team.

readGuide.description: This is the new Product Lead Guide. Don’t worry if this doesn’t make sense yet. Bookmark it and plan to look at it again.

virtualCoffee.description: You won’t know what to talk about, but that’s okay. It’s reassuring to know you’re not expected to know what’s going on yet.

virtualPMcoffee.description: Have virtual coffees (or real ones!) with other PMs. Ask tons of questions. Listen a lot. And don’t be worried about reaching out. Everyone was a new hire.

readTrelloBoard.description: The Trello board is here here Don’t worry. This won’t make a lot of sense yet either. Bookmark it and plan to keep an eye on it..

secondCoffee.description: Set up a second coffee with Josh. (You’ll be ready to start thinking about looking for a product now.)

learnGitHub.description: If you're not familiar with GitHub, Mural.ly, Trello and Slack - now's the time to learn. (Try searching the Handbook for help.)

moreCoffees.description: Schedule more virtual coffees (or real ones) with other PMS to learn more.
